about_the_game:
You're driving away on a forest road, late at night, under a heavy storm. Your car breaks down. Luckily, there might be a gas station nearby.

But a misfortune never comes alone. The storm has brought something else, something otherworldly that oddly smells of spilled diesel oil. When it rains, it pours.

AUTO-CRISIS is a short horror game about cars, rain, being lost, and bad days.

 

IMMERSIVE SHORT HORROR EXPERIENCE:

  • Realistic environments in a surreal setting.

  • You are soaked wet, and can barely see. The thunder strikes in the distance, revealing otherworldly creatures in the storm's vanishing light...

  • The rain has brought something else. You are not alone.

OTHERWORLDLY DANGERS:

  • There are ones that can be only seen when the storm strikes. Remember where they are to avoid them.

  • A writhing, radiant orb of light is passing through. Look away from its draining warmth, and do not be in its way.

  • A giant crawling creature is catching up on you. How will you escape it ?

HIGH QUALITY ENVIRONMENTS

Experience a short psychological experience packed with high fidelity graphics and optimization made available by Unreal Engine 5. The developement of this game was focused on quality over quantity. Go through a rural ruined parking, a subterrean sureal backroom, a boggy pine forest, and a continuous, endless road at night, away from everything.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has a realistic atmosphere may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. It has what can be assimilated to jumpscares, blood, violence and some gore.
